casebody.data:
Peggy NESTOR, etc., Appellant,
v.
PUTNEY TWOMBLY HALL & HIRSON, LLP, et al., Respondents, et al., Defendants. Motion No: 2017-1003 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 14, 2017

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
